divs: Sighting Details It was brighter than any star in the sky, not very many were as visible tonight compared to last night that is why it caught my eye, i though wow... a shooting star.. but no trail and i thought it was too bright.. then the distant muffled sound like something hitting...there was more distinct sounds than just a heavy object dropping. Let me know what you think. Cheryl
Summary: Very very bright white light, just south of the quarter moon in the western horizon apron 45 degree slightly less fell very rapidly, no tell, no sound.. shortly after it disappeared in tree line a very muffled distant sound was heard as if something hit
trends: There have been 148 other sightings in San Antonio
There was one other sighting in San Antonio on or around March 17th 2013
